entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY, Ottawa (Kanata - Orléans)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:38 p.m. EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 6.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ottawa Macdonald-Cartier Int'l Airport 2:00 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 6.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 24 km
Humidity: 52 %
Dewpoint: -2.5°C
Wind: SSW 21 km/h gust 44 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Wednesday: Rain showers or flurries. High 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon with rain showers or flurries at times heavy. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60. High 6. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries at times heavy ending this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the morning. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
